bibdata.title: High-voltage switchgear and controlgear -Part 37-082: Standard practice for the measurement of sound pressure levels on alternating current circuit-breakers
Redline
High-voltage switchgear and controlgear -Part 37-082: Standard practice for the measurement of sound pressure levels on alternating current circuit-breakers - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEC/IEEE 62271-37-082:2012(E) (Revision of IEEE Std C37.082-1982) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides methods for the measurement of sound pressure level produced by outdoor alternating current circuit-breakers in a free-field environment. These methods may also be used indoors or in restricted field, provided that precautions are observed in the measurement and interpretation of the results.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
